details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اغفر لي، وارحمني، واهدني، واجبرني، وعافني، وارزقني، وارفعني
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ، وَارْحَمْنِيْ، وَاهْدِنِيْ، وَاجْبُرْنِيْ، وَعَافِنِيْ، وَارْزُقْنِيْ، وَارْفَعْنِيْ
details.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee.
details.translations: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 1/231, Ibn Majah 898, At-Tirmithi 284-5. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 1/90 and Sahih Ibn Majah 1/148.
